challenges.title: Flamingo
challenges.description:
**FLAMINGO: 6 Tokens**

All team members must stand still on one foot, without support, for 90 seconds non-stop.

challenges.title: Morse Message
challenges.description:
**MORSE MESSAGE: 6 Tokens**

Use a Morse Code chart.

Have one team member walk 100 steps away, generate a random 5 letter word, then broadcast it in Morse Code using their phone’s flashlight.

Generate a new word for each attempt.

(Season 3 Challenge)

challenges.title: Two Birds One Stone
challenges.description:
Find and capture two birds in the same photo. The birds do not have to be real live birds. You may not produce any images of birds yourself.

(Season 3 Challenge)

challenges.title: Anagrams
challenges.description:
Roll a die. Using the corresponding set of letters, create 15 unique words. You may not use a letter more than once per word, and you may not attempt this challenge while moving.

1. F I E S T A       	4) D E C O Y S
2. C E A S E D     	5) A C C E N T
3. S T I N K Y	6) A R C A N E

challenges.title: Bracket City
challenges.description:
Play The Atlantic Times’s "Bracket City" game. You must get a score above 50, otherwise you earn no tokens and the veto penalty is incurred. You may not look up answers.

You may not move or take transit while attempting this challenge.

11 Tokens

challenges.title: Cheapo
challenges.description:
**CHEAPO: 12 Tokens**
Purchase an item that costs $3 or less from a retailer or vending machine.

(Season 3 Challenge)

challenges.title: Paper Racer
challenges.description: Acquire paper (or any thin, paper-like material) by any means and construct a paper airplane.

challenges.title: Wishful Thinking
challenges.description:
Have each team member make a wish at a public decorative water feature. Drinking fountains do not count.

(Season 3 Challenge)

challenges.title: Spitting Bars
challenges.description:
**SPITTING BARS: 6 Tokens**

Have one team member rap “The Church of Bobandy” at full speed with the original track in the background.

You must successfully memorize and rap at least 3 verses without mistakes in lyrics or timing.

(Season 3 Challenge)

challenges.title: Stretcher Stroll
challenges.description:
**STRETCHER STROLL: 5 tokens**

Two team members must hold the third team member horizontally like a stretcher (one holding the arms, one holding the legs) and carry them for 100 steps. You may switch roles at any time.

(Season 1 Challenge)

challenges.title: Alarm Clock
challenges.description:
**ALARM CLOCK: 5 Tokens**
Start a stopwatch and have one team member count to 2 minutes without assistance. If the stopwatch is within 15 seconds of 2 minutes when they stop, you succeed. Otherwise, you must restart.

challenges.title: Stay in Shape
challenges.description:
**STAY IN SHAPE: 5 tokens**

Roll a die 5 times. For every roll, all team members must complete the excercise indicated by the die:
1: 10 push-ups
2: 20 jumping jacks
3: 10 jump squats
4: 20 mountain climbers
5: 20 high knees
6: 10 half-burpees

(Season 2 Challenge)

challenges.title: Media Marketing
challenges.description:
**MEDIA MARKETING: 5 tokens**

Create a 30 second video advertising the nearest open establishment and send it to at least 3 people without context. At least 25 seconds of the video must include speaking.

(Season 1 Challenge)

challenges.title: Piggyback
challenges.description:
**PIGGYBACK: 5 tokens**

One team member must piggyback another team member for 100 steps. You may switch who is piggybacking at any time, but you may not move unless someone is being piggybacked.

(Season 1 Challenge)

challenges.title: Slow Down
challenges.description:
**SLOW DOWN: 6 tokens**

Find a speed limit sign of 30 km/h or under, and give it a high-five. You must high-five the actual sign, not the pole.

(Season 2 Challenge)

challenges.title: Dicey Deed
challenges.description:
**DICEY DEED: 2 x Dice roll tokens**

Roll a die. Visit the number of public trash cans indicated on the die and dispose something in each one.

(Season 2 Challenge)

challenges.title: Letter List
challenges.description:
**LETTER LIST: 10 tokens**

Go to any retail establishment. Find and list 20 products that start with different letters of the alphabet.

(Season 1 Challenge)

challenges.title: Parking Police
challenges.description:
**PARKING POLICE: 10 tokens**

Find a car parked on a line, in a no parking zone, or in an accessibility space (without a permit).

(Season 1 Challenge)

challenges.title: Bookworm
challenges.description:
**BOOKWORM: 15 tokens**

Find books in a store or library whose authors' initials match each team member’s initials. (For example, John Doe must find a book written by someone with the initials “J.D.”.)

(Season 1 Challenge)

challenges.title: Tall Tales
challenges.description:
Locate a Little Free Library and have one team member read five pages of a book out loud.

(Season 3 Challenge)

challenges.title: You Are Here
challenges.description:
**YOU ARE HERE: 15 tokens**
Find a physical map/directory and point our your current location on that map.

(Season 2 Challenge)

challenges.title: Atlas
challenges.description: Find an atlas and locate ??

challenges.title: Six Feet Under
challenges.description:
Six Feet Under**: 6 tokens**
Travel downwards using an elevator.

challenges.title: Shower Thoughts
challenges.description:
**SHOWER THOUGHTS: 10 Tokens**

One team member must pose a philosophical question next to spraying water from a spray park or public shower.

challenges.title: Internet Explorer
challenges.description: Successfully connect to 3 different public Wi-Fi networks.

challenges.title: Delayed Gratification
challenges.description:
**DELAYED GRATIFICATION: 12 Tokens**

Roll a die. If you roll a 6, the challenge is complete. Otherwise, you must wait 3 minutes before rolling again.

challenges.title: Bottle Flipper
challenges.description: Acquire a disposble plastic water bottle. Using this water bottle, successfully perform a bottle flip.

challenges.title: Dripped Out
challenges.description: Find a mannequin at any store, and find an article of clothing it is wearing elsewhere in the store.

challenges.title: Media Merch
challenges.description: Find 5 toys that reference something from pop culture (eg. a reference to a movie, show, or video game).

challenges.title: Grammer Polise
challenges.description:
**GRAMMAR POLICE: 15 tokens**
Find a literary error, such as a misspelled word or grammatical error, in the public.

challenges.title: Polyglot
challenges.description:
**POLYGLOT: 11 Tokens**

Find 3 instances of printed text, each in a different foreign language. Printed text includes signage, paper print, and engravings. Digital text does not count.

challenges.title: Urban Jungle
challenges.description: Take a selfie in front of a building with 4-10 visible stories.

challenges.title: Perimeter Patrol
challenges.description: Travel around the entire perimeter of a building on foot.

challenges.title: Wealthy Wager
challenges.description:
Choose an amount of tokens from your balance to bet on this challenge. 

Roll a die. If you roll a five or higher you earn double the tokens you bet. Otherwise you lose all the tokens you bet.

challenges.title: Long-Term Investment
challenges.description:
You lose half of your token balance, and it is now invested into this challenge.

After 20 minutes (or at the end of your run), your investment is multiplied by 1.5x and returned to your balance.

You may continue to do challenges as normal.

challenges.title: Classrooms
challenges.description: Something to do with finding room numbers

challenges.title: Company Criticism
challenges.description:
**COMPANY CRITICISM: 15 tokens**

Find the nearest 0 - 3 star rated establishment on Google and take a selfie in front of it. You may not rate any establishment yourself to fulfill the star requirement.

(Season 1 Challenge)

challenges.title: I'm Not a Robot
challenges.description:
**I'M NOT A ROBOT: 15 tokens**

Take pictures of:
3 crosswalks
3 fire hydrants
3 stop signs

Your photos may not depict anything else besides the specified object.

(Season 2 Challenge)

challenges.title: Devil's Contract
challenges.description:
Roll a die. If you roll an even number, you earn the amount of tokens indicated on the die. If you roll an odd number, no tokens are awarded and the veto penalty is incurred.

(Season 2 Challenge)

curses.title: Christmas Cheer
curses.description: All team members must sing a Christmas carol together out loud for 3 minutes.

curses.title: Touch Grass
curses.description: You have 3 minutes to get your entire team sitting on grass. If you fail, your team is frozen for 3 minutes.

curses.title: What's the Wordle
curses.description: Attempt today’s Wordle. The number of guesses your team makes on the Wordle equals the amount of minutes you are frozen for.

curses.title: Wet Floor
curses.description: You may not run for the next 25 minutes.

curses.title: Caddy at Capacity
curses.description:
For the next 10 minutes, one team member must carry all team members’ belongings, while the other team members may not carry anything except their phone.

(Season 1 Challenge)

curses.title: Lockdown
curses.description: If Hiders are in a building, they are locked inside for 10 minutes.

curses.title: Freeze!
curses.description: The Hiders are frozen for 3 minutes.

curses.title: Blindfold
curses.description: One team member is blindfolded for 10 minutes.
